trends: There have been 4 other sightings in East Brunswick
There was one other sighting in East Brunswick on or around July 23rd 2010
divs: Sighting DetailsLast summer while walking my dog, I observed a low flying object passing over tree tops. As I waited for it to clear, not moving my possition, I realized it had disappeared. I figured I was halucinating and said nothing to no one. The same summer of 2010 I also witnessed two jets flying over the skys of Middlesex County, NJ when one cloaked for about three seconds reappeared, recloaked for about three seconds, reappeared for about three seconds and recloaked. The amazing thing about the event is that the cloaked jet also lost,masked,or cloaked it's contrails. What spurred me to recount this was a MUFON show on History where a gentleman out west recounted a simslar experience to your investigators. I had never mentioned this to anyone before now. 1. In my front yard sky watching 2. Jets often fly over leaving chem trails
Summary: a low flying boject that appeared to cloak or disappear
